email_group_1.subject: I need you to check this file ASAP
email_group_1.desc: Hey, attached is a file that I need you to look at ASAP. So please, at your earliest convenience open the file and run it on your computer.

email_group_1.subject: Look into this file for me when you get a chance
email_group_1.desc: Hey, when you get a chance I need you to look at this important file for me. I need it reviewed this week, and email me back with any questions.
